title: ninringunnaruL kATTum sollonru
sahitya:
ninringunnaruL kATTum sollonru sonnAlum 
nenjam kuzhaindiDudE (vElA) nIla mayilErum vElan


anupallavi

  enrenrum naTamADum iraivan taru kumarA
			(madhyamakAlam)
himayam tAzhginra pugazh vaDivElA ediriyA ninra nirutar kula kAlA vElA


caraNam    OrEzhu paDai vIDu koNDAi (murugA) viLangum unnAru paDai vIDum en uLLamum shErndAga
IrEzh ulagum paNI koNDAi enenum engaL tamizh vaLLi ezhil munnE vIzhndAi kArmukhil pOL viLangum 
mAl marugA murugA kaninda manaduLa aDiyavar shirakka shiranda aruL nirai mukhattavA sherinda 
niramurum mayilmishai viLangum maNanda iruvarum aNaittavA kadamba malar kamalamODu veghu vidam 
parandu aNinda puyattavA karuNai mazhai pozhiyum kanda kumaraguru para mukunda maruga murugA ena ninaindu
